name: Pirates Of The Sea - An Inspired Game
name_original: Pirates Of The Sea - An Inspired Game
description:
Sea of Thieves a game of piracy, looting, adventures and action and with one of the developer's best community.

  Pirates Of The Sea brings the same piracy, adventures, high graphic and many more. With also monthly updates the game will get better. Pirates Of The Sea a vast area of those who have interest in very large open-world with high freedom. Here's that game which bring that all joys with love of Sea of Thieves. POTS(nickname to this game) will a base for the players who will or want to step in world to Sea of Thieves. This is tiny step towards the Sea of thieves.

The is set to place where you as a player comes across

MINIMUM:- 1GB SPACE REQUIRED
